title: VR-Based Social Learning Design and Application

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Grasp of Social Science Concepts and Digital Device Proficiency
context.additional_context: Social sector job-linked training for office/administrative professionals. VR content-based learning conducted in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the causes and effects of social phenomena in VR environments
Learners can reconstruct the context of historical events with over 80% accuracy through VR simulations
Learners demonstrate a 30% or greater improvement in knowledge acquisition on formative assessments post-VR learning compared to pre-assessments

resources: VR Learning Objects (Historical Simulation, Social Problem-Solving Scenarios)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
